title: Careful Application of Heat Could Extend the Lifetime of a Battery
text:
Careful Application of Heat Could Extend the Lifetime of a Battery 
Published By: Gizmodo.com - Today 
Think of heat and batteries, and you probably imagine a li-on cell bursting into flames. But now researchers think that a little heat at the...
